body:
# Bug Report

## Description

If you remove/add the user from the group chat, the system message that the user left/added the group will be displayed only after the app restart

## Steps to reproduce

1. Create a private group chat
2. Remove/add one of the members

#### Expected behavior
The system message that [user] left the group/was added is present

#### Actual behavior
The system message that [user] left the group/ was added is absent

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/117639195/225014837-d43b7056-034c-48ce-80cf-8fff8e398035.mov

### Additional Information
 
- Status desktop version: 0.10.0-rc13
- Operating System: macos

TODO: it would be nice to resolve, when user left the group and when user was removed by admin from the group
